experience: You and Terry both know Dan Nienhauser, Todd Brugger, and 41 others
Host, Producer:  Nationally Syndicated On-Air NewsTalk Radio "Think! America"​
Writer, Producer, on-air Host of news-driven, issue-oriented Town Hall news talk radio show,"Think! America"  Nationally Syndicated on Radio America.
On-Air NewsTalk Radio Host, Senior Producer, Fox News Radio, NewsTalk 550 KFYI

Create, research, write, produce and host news-driven, issue-oriented talk shows, with live caller input.  Subject matter includes local, regional, national and international headline issues.  Expert guests are a mainstay of "The Terry Gilberg Show."    Duties also include professional speaking engagements and keynotes speeches, personal appearances, hosting Town Hall forums, serving as an emcee for public functions, and moderating panels and debates. Contributor and anchor of live election coverage during election cycles. Contributor to KFYI blogs, Twitter and Facebook tools.   Creator, producer and host of in-depth investigative reports on complicated and controversial subjects. Well-versed with writing and executing on-air commercials, public service announcements, promotions, public campaigns, advertising campaigns.
Public Figure, On-Air News Talk Radio Host
iHeart Media, Clear Channel Media and Entertainment
Phoenix, AZ, Houston, TX, San Diego, CA, Tucson, AZ
NewsTalk 550, KFYI, Phoenix, AZ NewsTalk 740, KTRH, Houston, TXNewsTalk  790, KNST, Tucson, AZNewsTalk "The 9-5-0" KPRC, Houston, TXAvailable for fill-in hosting throughout the United States

In the time that I have known and worked with Terry at KFYI she has always been a professional at what she does.She has a way of making the complex issues of the day easy to understand and comprehend.Terry has a great sense of humor that is genuine and clearly comes across in person and on air.She always has command of the facts and always does her research in advance. She never shoots from the hip.Her show is not about name calling anyone but educating everyone who is willing to listen.If you want to know the real scoop, Terry will give it to you.Bryan ScienzaLaureate Education Inc.

July 18, 2017, Terry worked with Hugh in the same group

Terry Gilberg and I share similar loves – discussing important topics of the day, sharing political conservative thoughts, and Stanford University. We met originally at a Stanford alumni function, and later I worked with her as a guest Town Hall “talker” on her radio shows.  Some of the ways Terry and her work are special include:     --Her spectacular organizational skills in producing a variety of fascinating topics into compelling shows. She orchestrates extremely well, and I learned a great deal researching the variety of interesting current events and issues.      --Her excellent and all business-like manner at explaining the direction of the show for Town Hall guests.  She made the complex simple and succinct.--Her marvelous grasp of subject matter, and her way of supporting her Town Hall guests with more depth rounding out the conversation.  She has an amazing command of content and makes the material flow.  She also handles expert interviewees with knowledge and ease.--Her delivery as MC and executive producer is strong, compelling, and warm.  I thoroughly enjoyed my experience working with Terry, and would love to work with her again.  I give her an A++! Hugh K. Tirrell, --Author and CEO, I Am America Books.com--MBA, Stanford Business School.  AdChoices

July 13, 2017, Terry worked with Joel B in the same group

I've had the great pleasure to work with Terry on-air at both her nationally syndicated talk show on Radio America - Think! America - and at her 550 KFYI Phoenix iHeart Media show. She is always prepared, organized, and effective at balancing the rigors of a time-sensitive production with communicating insight, knowledge, and warmth to her guests and listeners.As an experienced contributor to her shows, the quality I've come to appreciate especially is her instinct for designing the show. No one on talk radio brings together such diverse topics, which speaks to her experience and diligence at research. Every listener is going to connect with at least one of her selections, and there's always one genuinely surprising topic every hour that keeps me (and I'm sure her other listeners) on the edge of their seats closely engaged. Her talent for this reminds me of a skilled musical director who arranges a memorable concert program. An amateur might look at the selections and think, "Why would she put these pieces together in this order?" But then comes the show and you have to sit back in admiration afterwards as you realize, "Wow...now *that* was interesting!" She knows exactly what she's doing.Terry brings boundless energy, resourcefulness and dedication to her work. I'm always honored to be invited on her show and look forward to working with her as frequently as I can.

October 20, 2015, Terry worked with Martina in the same group

Terry adds spark and an intellectual edge to normally mundane news topics. Her sharp wit, measured dialog and insightful, fact-driven opinions are a refreshing change from other local Phoenix radio programs.  Smart and engaging, Terry fosters dialog about issues facing Freedom Loving Americans across the US, not just Phoenix. Inspiring and current, her news/talk programs are a must! Terry is also a professional speaker and a superb emcee, moderator, and live host. She speaks on subjects regarding the broadcasting industry, particularly news and news/talk, as well as social, cultural, and political issues. Terry is wonderful in-person, as a keynote, moderator, or panelist. She is highly organized, produces on her feet, and delivers with aplomb, so that your event is a smooth and enriching experience.

June 26, 2015, Carole worked with Terry but at different companies

I first discovered Terry Gilberg about six years ago.  I was seeking talk show hosts to interview my clients.  I found Terry to be an exceptionally bright professional whose background establishes her on a national platform.Since that time I have brought a variety of clients to Terry, ranging from law enforcement officers to a grieving mother.  She has the expertise to cover all sides of a story.  Ms. Gilberg is so talented that she is found on national talk shows providing her "Terry's Take" commentary.  Terry Gilberg is a joy with whom to work.  KFYI really made a good decision when they hired her.

July 18, 2017, Terry worked with Bryan in different groups

As a professional news talk radio host, I always look for interesting material, expert interviewees, and sometimes great panelists to join me on air.  I discovered Bryan as a panelist when he reached out to me letting me know of his keen interest in news and his prior background producing talk at ABC radio in Los Angeles.   When I spoke with him I knew he had a "nose for news' and passion for the material.  Moreover, he's got the chops!  I've used  Bryan as a panelist dishing it up with me on the hot topics of the day and will continue to call on him because he comes prepared before he gives any thoughtful commentary.  He can roll through vexing issues in a conversational style, trippingly on the tongue.  A good panelist to "let your hair down with!"

I highly recommend John who is a wiz at all things digital, especially social media.  In my world, where I respond daily to many listeners worldwide, John helped me navigate all public requests with ease and taught me valuable shortcuts and strategies to get back to listeners and fans in a timely fashion. John is very insightful about the needs of a public figure such as myself, and is equally patient and thorough.  There isn't a question for which he doesn't have an effective solution.  Contact John for all your social media digital needs.  He gets it!
